title: Modern Minimalist Apartment
brief: A sophisticated urban retreat featuring clean lines, neutral tones, and carefully curated furnishings that maximize space while maintaining elegance.
testimonial: The transformation exceeded our expectations. Every detail was thoughtfully considered.

title: Scandinavian Family Home
brief: Warm, functional design emphasizing natural materials, cozy textures, and family-friendly layouts.
testimonial: A perfect blend of style and functionality for our growing family.

title: Industrial Loft Conversion
brief: Converting a raw industrial space into a sophisticated living environment while preserving original architectural elements.
testimonial: Incredible vision and execution. The space feels both edgy and comfortable.

title: Coastal Retreat
brief: Ocean-inspired design featuring natural textures, flowing layouts, and panoramic views.
testimonial: Every morning feels like a vacation in our own home.

title: Urban Penthouse
brief: Luxury high-rise living with dramatic city views and sophisticated material palette.
testimonial: The perfect balance of luxury and livability.
